content:
SystemBrushes Class

In this Article

Each property of the SystemBrushes class is a SolidBrush that is the color of a Windows display element.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class SystemBrushes

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • SystemBrushes

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Properties summary

ActiveBorder

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the active window's border.
ActiveCaption

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.
ActiveCaptionText

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.
AppWorkspace

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the application workspace.
ButtonFace

Gets a SolidBrush that is the face color of a 3-D element.
ButtonHighlight

Gets a SolidBrush that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
ButtonShadow

Gets a SolidBrush that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
Control

Gets a SolidBrush that is the face color of a 3-D element.
ControlDark

Gets a SolidBrush that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
ControlDarkDark

Gets a SolidBrush that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.
ControlLight

Gets a SolidBrush that is the light color of a 3-D element.
ControlLightLight

Gets a SolidBrush that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
ControlText

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of text in a 3-D element.
Desktop

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the desktop.
GradientActiveCaption

Gets a SolidBrush that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.
GradientInactiveCaption

Gets a SolidBrush that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.
GrayText

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of dimmed text.
Highlight

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of selected items.
HighlightText

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the text of selected items.
HotTrack

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.
InactiveBorder

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of an inactive window's border.
InactiveCaption

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.
InactiveCaptionText

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.
Info

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.
InfoText

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the text of a ToolTip.
Menu

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of a menu's background.
MenuBar

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of a menu bar.
MenuHighlight

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.
MenuText

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of a menu's text.
ScrollBar

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.
Window

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.
WindowFrame

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of a window frame.
WindowText

Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.

Methods summary

FromSystemColor(Color)

Creates a Brush from the specified Color structure.

Properties

  • ActiveBorder

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the active window's border.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ActiveBorder { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the active window's border.

  • ActiveCaption

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ActiveCaption { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.

  • ActiveCaptionText

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ActiveCaptionText { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.

  • AppWorkspace

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the application workspace.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush AppWorkspace { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the application workspace.

    Remarks

    The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.

  • ButtonFace

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the face color of a 3-D element.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ButtonFace { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the face color of a 3-D element.

  • ButtonHighlight

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ButtonHighlight { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

    Remarks

    This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.

  • ButtonShadow

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ButtonShadow { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.

    Remarks

    This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.

  • Control

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the face color of a 3-D element.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush Control { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the face color of a 3-D element.

  • ControlDark

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ControlDark { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.

    Remarks

    The shadow color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.

  • ControlDarkDark

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ControlDarkDark { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.

    Remarks

    The dark shadow color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the darkest color.

  • ControlLight

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the light color of a 3-D element.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ControlLight { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the light color of a 3-D element.

    Remarks

    The light color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.

  • ControlLightLight

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ControlLightLight { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

    Remarks

    The highlight color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the lightest color.

  • ControlText

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of text in a 3-D element.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ControlText { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of text in a 3-D element.

  • Desktop

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the desktop.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush Desktop { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the desktop.

  • GradientActiveCaption

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush GradientActiveCaption { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.

  • GradientInactiveCaption

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush GradientInactiveCaption { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.

  • GrayText

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of dimmed text.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush GrayText { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of dimmed text.

    Remarks

    Disabled items in a list are displayed in dimmed text.

  • Highlight

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of selected items.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush Highlight { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the background of selected items.

    Remarks

    Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. For example, the brush may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.

  • HighlightText

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the text of selected items.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush HighlightText { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the text of selected items.

    Remarks

    Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. For example, the brush may be the color used for the text of selected items in a list box.

  • HotTrack

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush HotTrack { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.

    Remarks

    Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.

  • InactiveBorder

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of an inactive window's border.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush InactiveBorder { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of an inactive window's border.

  • InactiveCaption

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush InactiveCaption { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.

  • InactiveCaptionText

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush InactiveCaptionText { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.

  • Info

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush Info { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.

  • InfoText

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the text of a ToolTip.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush InfoText { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush is the color of the text of a ToolTip.

  • Menu

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of a menu's background.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush Menu { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of a menu's background.

  • MenuBar

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of a menu bar.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush MenuBar { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the background of a menu bar.

  • MenuHighlight

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush MenuHighlight { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.

  • MenuText

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of a menu's text.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush MenuText { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of a menu's text.

  • ScrollBar

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush ScrollBar { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.

  • Window

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush Window { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.

  • WindowFrame

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of a window frame.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush WindowFrame { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of a window frame.

  • WindowText

    Gets a SolidBrush that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush WindowText { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A SolidBrush that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.

Methods

  • FromSystemColor(Color)

    Creates a Brush from the specified Color structure.

    public static System.Drawing.Brush FromSystemColor (System.Drawing.Color c);

    Parameters

    • c
      Color

      The Color structure from which to create the Brush.

    Returns

    • Brush

      The Brush this method creates.
